meta.name: Monitor Commercial Real Estate Opportunities from LoopNet with ScrapeGraphAI & Telegram

parameters.content:
# Daily CRE Scanner ‚è∞

**Automated Market Monitoring:**
- Runs every 24 hours automatically
- Triggers the entire CRE intelligence pipeline
- No manual intervention required
- Consistent market data collection

**Schedule Benefits:**
‚úÖ Fresh data daily
‚úÖ Catches new listings immediately
‚úÖ Tracks market changes over time
‚úÖ Reliable automation

**Configuration:**
‚Ä¢ Interval: 24 hours
‚Ä¢ Timezone: Server default
‚Ä¢ Error handling: Built-in retry
‚Ä¢ Next execution: Visible in logs

**What Happens Next:**
‚Üí Triggers CRE data collection from major platforms
‚Üí Initiates complete market analysis
‚Üí Generates daily intelligence report

# CRE Data Collector üï∑Ô∏è

**AI-Powered Web Scraping:**
- Uses ScrapeGraphAI for intelligent extraction
- Targets major CRE platforms (LoopNet)
- Structured data output with schema
- Handles dynamic content automatically

**Data Points Collected:**
‚úÖ Property ID & type
‚úÖ Size (square footage)
‚úÖ Location details
‚úÖ Pricing information
‚úÖ Lease rates ($/sqft)
‚úÖ Contact information

**API Configuration:**
‚Ä¢ Endpoint: ScrapeGraphAI smart scraper
‚Ä¢ Method: POST with JSON payload
‚Ä¢ Timeout: 60 seconds
‚Ä¢ Authentication: Header-based

**Target Platform:**
‚Ä¢ LoopNet commercial listings
‚Ä¢ Real-time market data
‚Ä¢ Comprehensive property details

**Output Format:**
‚Üí Structured JSON with listings array
‚Üí Ready for immediate analysis

parameters.name: user_prompt
parameters.value: Extract commercial real estate listings: property type, size, location, price, lease rate, contact info

parameters.content:
# CRE Analyzer & Dashboard üìä

**Comprehensive Market Intelligence:**
- Processes scraped listings data
- Generates market summary & insights
- Identifies investment opportunities
- Creates actionable dashboard

**Analysis Features:**
‚úÖ Property type distribution
‚úÖ Location popularity ranking
‚úÖ Average lease rate calculation
‚úÖ Below-market opportunity detection
‚úÖ Alert generation system

**Key Calculations:**
‚Ä¢ Total listings processed
‚Ä¢ Market rate averages
‚Ä¢ Geographic clustering
‚Ä¢ Opportunity scoring
‚Ä¢ Priority rankings

**Alert Triggers:**
‚Ä¢ High opportunity count (>10 properties)
‚Ä¢ Rate alerts (>$30/sqft average)
‚Ä¢ Market anomalies

**Dashboard Output:**
‚Üí Executive summary with KPIs
‚Üí Top 5 property types & locations
‚Üí Priority opportunities list
‚Üí Actionable next steps

# Opportunity Check üéØ

**Smart Conditional Logic:**
- Evaluates if opportunities were found
- Only sends alerts when action needed
- Prevents notification spam
- Optimizes workflow efficiency

**Decision Logic:**
‚úÖ Checks opportunities_found > 0
‚úÖ Routes to notification if true
‚úÖ Skips alerts if no opportunities
‚úÖ Always logs data regardless

**Benefits:**
‚Ä¢ Reduces noise in communications
‚Ä¢ Focuses attention on actionable items
‚Ä¢ Saves API calls when not needed
‚Ä¢ Maintains clean notification history

**Routing Logic:**
‚Üí TRUE: Send Telegram alert with details
‚Üí FALSE: Skip notification, continue logging
‚Üí BOTH: Always log to Google Sheets

**Configuration:**
‚Ä¢ Condition: opportunities_found > 0
‚Ä¢ Type: Number comparison
‚Ä¢ Case sensitive: True
‚Ä¢ Strict validation: Enabled

# Send Opportunity Alert üì±

**Instant Telegram Notifications:**
- Sends formatted CRE daily report
- Includes market summary & top opportunities
- Only triggers when opportunities exist
- Professional message formatting

**Message Content:**
‚úÖ Market summary with key metrics
‚úÖ Total properties analyzed
‚úÖ Average lease rate
‚úÖ Top 3 opportunities with details
‚úÖ Alert summary

**Setup Requirements:**
‚Ä¢ Telegram Bot Token (from @BotFather)
‚Ä¢ Chat ID (your Telegram user/group ID)
‚Ä¢ Bot must be added to chat
‚Ä¢ Proper permissions configured

**Message Format:**
üè¢ **CRE Daily Report**
üìä Market metrics
üéØ Top opportunities
‚ö†Ô∏è Active alerts

**Benefits:**
‚Üí Immediate awareness of opportunities
‚Üí Mobile-friendly notifications
‚Üí Formatted for quick reading
‚Üí Historical message log

# Log to Google Sheets üìà

**Historical Data Tracking:**
- Automatically logs daily CRE metrics
- Builds historical trend database
- Enables long-term market analysis
- Creates data foundation for reporting

**Logged Metrics:**
‚úÖ Date (YYYY-MM-DD format)
‚úÖ Total properties analyzed
‚úÖ Average lease rate
‚úÖ Opportunities count
‚úÖ Top location
‚úÖ Alert count

**Setup Requirements:**
‚Ä¢ Google Sheets document ID
‚Ä¢ Sheet name: 'CRE_Analysis'
‚Ä¢ Service account authentication
‚Ä¢ Proper column headers

**Benefits:**
‚Ä¢ Track market trends over time
‚Ä¢ Identify seasonal patterns
‚Ä¢ Monitor alert frequency
‚Ä¢ Export data for analysis
‚Ä¢ Historical performance review

**Data Structure:**
‚Üí One row per day
‚Üí Standardized column mapping
‚Üí Automatic date stamping
‚Üí Consistent data format
